entry.title: Ispalla Incense Peru
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ispalla
Type: Incense
Price: 2.75 - 125.00 (11 variants)

NEW! Ispalla Incense Sticks from Peru

The energies of northern Peru are fused in incense sticks of Palo Santo to form a pleasant and relaxing aroma that cleanses the energies of every corner of your home or office. It is ideal to use in Yoga, Reiki and meditation practices as it will help to relax the mind and reduce stress.

Ispalla incenses are made with the highest quality of resins to offer a unique and relaxing experience. There are no chemical components in its preparation, each person who lights an Ispalla incense will be enjoying the unique aromas of Peru.

entry.title: Crown Relief Roll On
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nourished Magnesium
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 7.95

An uplifting and feel good way of finding relief, naturally. Made with care in Nova Scotia, Canada using natural, earth-derived magnesium chloride. 

Most popular use: headache relief.

entry.title: Magnesium Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nourished Magnesium
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 20.95

Blended with skin nourishing Unrefined Shea Butter and Organic Sunflower Seed Oil, our Magnesium Cream provides relief inside and out! Nourished Magnesium uses only Magnesium Chloride in the making of its products, which is one of the most bio-available types of Magnesium on the market.

​Applied topically, Magnesium can be applied directly to the area of concern, bypassing the need for digestion or risk of an upset stomach. It enters through the skin and directly into the bloodstream, meaning fast results! Best results are felt when used daily on an area of concern.

Most popular use: Magnesium Cream: Best results are felt when used daily on an area of concern. Apply to lower abdomen for uses that don’t have specific “areas” of the body or specific areas of concern.

125ml. Available in Unscented, Lavender.

entry.title: Magnesium Cream with Arnica
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nourished Magnesium
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 22.95

Blended with skin nourishing Unrefined Shea Butter and Organic Sunflower Seed Oil, the Magnesium Cream with Arnica provides relief inside and out! Nourished Magnesium uses only Magnesium Chloride in the making of its products, which is one of the most bio-available types of Magnesium on the market.

​Applied topically, Magnesium can be applied directly to the area of concern, bypassing the need for digestion or risk of an upset stomach. It enters through the skin and directly into the bloodstream, meaning fast results! Best results are felt when used daily on an area of concern.

Most popular use: Magnesium Cream + Arnica: Massage directly over specific body parts that require an extra strength fast and effective relief from sore/tense muscles, arthritic areas and bruising.

125ml. Available in Unscented, Lavender.

entry.title: Magnesium Body Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nourished Magnesium
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 10.95

Nourished Magnesium uses only Magnesium Chloride in the making of its products, which is one of the most bio-available types of Magnesium on the market.

Applied topically, Magnesium can be applied directly to the area of concern, bypassing the need for digestion or risk of an upset stomach. It enters through the skin and directly into the bloodstream, meaning fast results! Best results are felt when used daily on an area of concern. Apply to lower abdomen (the most absorbent part of the body) for uses that don’t have specific “areas” or just for general supplementation.

Most popular use: An application to the lower abdomen before a deep and restful sleep! ​

100ml. Available in Unscented, Lavender, Mint + Menthol.

entry.title: Yoga Potion Chill Body Spray 120ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yoga Potion
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 7.50

CHILL Mist & Body Spray works wonderfully to help promote balanced hormones, spray chest, face, thighs and belly to help alleviate hot flashes or PMS. Also great as a calming body spray throughout the day.

Yoga Potion is a Canadian Company from Kelowna B.C.

All of their products are handmade and blends have been carefully formulated with Master Herbalist Blaine Andrusek. In their own words: "Our balanced healthy energy is necessary to align with and respect the essence of the oils, ensuring the synergistic blends come to market with their purest potential for healing effects and aesthetic enjoyment."

entry.title: Marseille's Remedy Hand Sanitizer 60ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Creek Naturals
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 7.15

Marseille's Hand Sanitizer is more than just a normal sanitizer, it’s a modern rendition of an age-old medicated spray. Approved by Health Canada, Marseille’s Hand Sanitizer kills germs on contact and is gentle on your skin. It is made with all-natural ingredients and has all the topical effects of Marseille’s Remedy. 

Medical Ingredients:

75% grain alcohol (ethanol)

Non-medical ingredients:

vegetable glycerin, purified water and Aloe Vera. Marseille’s Remedy / Syzygium aromaticum (Clove bud oil*), Citrus limon (Lemon oil*), Cinnamomum verum (Cinnamon bark oil*), Eucalyptus polybractea (Blue Mallee Eucalyptus oil*), Rosmarinus officinalis  (Rosemary oil*).

*organic content

entry.title: Marseille's Remedy Traditional Balm 25ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Creek Naturals
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 6.59

Rub Marseille’s Remedy Traditional Balm on sore muscles and joints to relieve pain and inflammation. Apply on the chest to clear airways and breathe easy. Approved by Health Canada with NPN number for topical use. 

Medical Ingredients:

Syzygium aromaticum (Clove bud oil* – India), Citrus limon (Lemon* oil – Italli), Cinnamomum verum (True Cinnamon bark oil* – Sri Lanka), Eucalyptus polybractea (Blue Mallee Eucalyptus oil* – Australia), Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary oil* – Spain), Arnica montana (Arnica oil* – Canada), Mentha (natural Menthol – India), Cinnamomum camphora (natural Camphor – Taiwan)

Non-medical ingredients:

Cera alba (Canadian Beeswax)
*contains organic content, alcohol/chemical-free

entry.title: Marseille's Remedy Essential Oil 30ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Creek Naturals
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 14.97

Marseille's Remedy Traditional Oil uses a centuries-old blend of "thieves" style essential oils that can be used diluted or as a base in many DIY recipes for household cleaners and wellness products. Approved by Health Canada with NPN numbers for topical/inhalant and internal use.

Medical Ingredients:

Syzygium aromaticum (Clove bud oil* – India), Citrus limon (Lemon oil* – Italli), Cinnamomum verum (True Cinnamon bark oil* – Sri Lanka), Eucalyptus polybractea (Blue Mallee Eucalyptus oil* – Australia), Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary oil* – Spain). *organic content, alcohol/chemical-free

Junglista is specially formulated from natural ingredients for the outdoor enthusiasts who are simply exhausted from non-stop flailing.

entry.title: Papier d'Armenie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Papier d'Armenie
Type: Incense
Price: 4.00 - 20.00 (4 variants)

Known worldwide as the most ancient natural room deodorizer; since 1885.

 Made from natural ingredients such as benzoin and incense.

Created to perfume your home and eliminate unpleasant odors such as frying, tobacco, cat litter, bathroom or dampness. Bring it with you on your travels : car, vacation home, hotel room.

The absorbent paper used to manufacture Papier d’Arménie® is certified by the Forest Stewardship Council, an independent international organisation to promote the responsible management of the world's forests.

Papier d’Arménie can also be used without burning it to deodorize wardrobes or drawers. Each booklet has 36 pre-cut paper strips, in twelve sheets of 3.

Ceramic holder comes in assorted colours. It has a triangular base with sides of 14.5cm & Dome 8cm in diameter.

entry.title: Badger After Sun Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Badger Balms
Type: All-Natural Bodycare
Price: 9.75

Soothing After-Sun Skin Care. Badger's all-natural and organic After Sun Balm is Packed with soothing Cocoa and Shea Butters, and makes a great addition to any sun care routine. Sun, wind, salt, and sand all take a toll on skin, and After Sun Balm helps to restore the balance. Lavender and Moroccan Blue Tansy oils contribute to the delightful tropical scent and have been shown to exhibit anti-inflammatory properties, helping to soothe, cool, and relieve your dry, tight skin after sun exposure

entry.title: Singing Bowls & Accessories
entry.summary:
Vendor: Soul Scents
Type: Accessories
Price: 0.00 - 12.00 (12 variants)

These hand hammered Singing Bowls are made with 7 different metals; gold, silver, copper, iron, lead, tin & zinc. They are all priced and sold by weight at $100/kg. For ease of ordering they have been broken down into the following sizes and price will be determined upon what is available within that size range. I would suggest picking a size/dollar value that you are interested in and I will specify on the invoice what the specific weight is for you. If you have specific requests feel free to add a note to your order or send me an email.

X-Small  300-499gr  approx. 3.5-4" diameter  Range $30 to 49

Small 500-599gr  approx. 5" diameter  Range $50 to 59

Medium 600-799gr  approx. 6" diameter  Range $60 to 79

Large 800-899gr  approx. 7-7.5" diameter  Range $80 to 89

X-Large 900gr-1.2kg  approx. 8.5-9" diameter  Range $90 to 120

Mini Sticks are suitable for the X-small bowls. Small Sticks are suitable for the Small-Medium bowls. Medium Sticks are suitable for the Large+ bowls
